text: Giovanni Paolo Recchi (mid-17th century) was an Italian painter and architect of the Barock period. Born in Como. He worked in Turin and the Duchy of Savoy in fresco, with the assistance of his nephew Giovanni Antonio and his brother Giovanni Battista Recchi. Active in 1650. ==References== * Category:16th- century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Piedmontese painters Category:Italian Renaissance painters Category:Year of death unknown Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Giovanni Paolo Recchi
